name: generic-repository-template
description: This project is a bare bones node project that utilizes Typescript as it's main language and Mocha for testing.  Your tasks are as follows:  - Integrate any API of your choice in this repository and re-expose it as an HTTP Endpoint(s). It doesn't matter how big the API is.     - Create a documentation of your API wrapper using markdown     - Test coverage should be at least 70%  - Design a simple API which to manage books in a library.     - Document using markdown     - No need to code this
